name: Verreciel (itch)
description:
Verreciel is a space exploration game with controls reminiscent of modular synthetisers. The game joins the sequence of linguistically involved projects like Paradise, Hiversaires and Oquonie. An original soundtrack was created for the game and released on Beldam Records.

This release was made possible by @rezmason who has practically ported the Swift code into HTML5.
